YardSale Class List

Here are the classes, structs, unions and interfaces with brief descriptions:
DateTimeA temporary structure for holding date information
ExpatThis class helps us interface with expat. Expat interface
Expat::ParseFailureThere was a failure parsing the input
ReceiptThis class is the abstraction layer for the receipt printers
XMLNodeAn XML Tag represented as a single class
XMLNode::InvalidChildAn attempt to access an invalid child was made
XMLNode::ParseFailureThe data could not be parsed as XML
XMLNode::XMLNodeDataReference counted XML data
XMLParserAn XML Parser
XMLParser::DiskErrorThere was an error reading/writing from disk
XMLParser::ParseFailureThe XML parser could not parse the string
YardAboutGLThis is a scrolly, eye-candy about screen
YardCalcThe calculator dialog
YardCalcDlgThis is the on-screen calculator dialog for YardSale
YardCarrierTypeThe YardSale Carrier Type is a OO representation of the datebase package table
YardCheckoutThe checkout screen
YardConfigThis class manages configuration settings which are platform independant and therefore use dot files in Linux and registry in Win32
YardCustomerYardCustomer is the customer managment screen for YardSale
YardDatabaseThis is the main database backend which does all translation from OO calls to SQL/ODBC
YardDBExceptionA Database exception
YardDBTypeAbstract base class for datebase objects in YardSale
YardDebugScreenThe debug screen allows a user to see the active program log and selectively login to databases with a specified username and password
YardEmployeeYardEmployee is the employee managment screen for YardSale
YardEmployeeTypeThis is a datatype to represent an Employee record
YardExceptionException class from CryptoPP
YardFooterThe footer is a easy-access panel to launch the on-screen calc and keyboard
YardInventoryThe inventory screen displays items in the inventory and allows seaching
YardInvTypeThe YardSale Inventory Type is a OO representation of the datebase inventory table
YardInvType::BulkPricingThis struct associates a quantity with a percentage for bulk pricing
YardKeybrdDlgThis is the on-screen keyboard dialog for YardSale
YardLogLogging widget, based on a wxListCtrl and wxLog This widget resets the default logging system and redirects all output to itself
YardLoginThis is the customized login screen for YardSale
YardMainYardMain is the main menu screen for YardSale, it displays graphical buttons for accessing the inventory, employees, sales, etc
YardNewCustomerThe new customer wizard
YardNewEmployeeThe new employee wizard
YardPackageTypeThe YardSale Package Type is a OO representation of the datebase package table
YardReportsThis is the report management screen, from here the user can generate reports and preview them
YardSaleThis is the main application object
YardSaleScreenThis is the main sale screen
YardShipTypeThe YardSale Shipping Type is a OO representation of the datebase package table
YardSplashEye-candy splash screen that shows a progress bar
YardVendTypeThe YardSale Vendor Type is a OO representation of the datebase vendor table
